name: Red Dragon
description: The Red Dragon is a powerful and aggressive creature, known for its fiery breath and its love of treasure.

name: Blue Dragon
description: The Blue Dragon is a cunning and cruel creature, known for its lightning breath and its love of treasure.

name: Green Dragon
description: The Green Dragon is a deceptive and cunning creature, using its natural camouflage to ambush its prey and its poison breath to disable opponents.

name: White Dragon
description: The White Dragon is a savage and cruel creature, known for its icy breath and its sharp claws.

name: Black Dragon
description: The Black Dragon is a cunning and cruel creature, known for its acid breath and its love of treasure.

name: Copper Dragon
description: The Copper Dragon is a mischievous and playful creature, known for its acid breath and its love of pranks.

name: Bronze Dragon
description: The Bronze Dragon is a noble and honorable creature, known for its lightning breath and its love of justice.

name: Gold Dragon
description: The Gold Dragon is a wise and powerful creature, known for its healing breath and its love of goodness and justice.

name: Silver Dragon
description: The Silver Dragon is a majestic and honorable creature, known for its cold breath and its love of knowledge.

name: Brass Dragon
description: The Brass Dragon is a talkative and friendly creature, known for its fire breath and its love of conversation.

name: Crystal Dragon
description: The Crystal Dragon is a beautiful and mysterious creature, known for its psychic breath and its love of crystals.

name: Mercury Dragon
description: The Mercury Dragon is a quick and agile creature, known for its mercury breath and its love of puzzles.

name: Platinum Dragon
description: The Platinum Dragon is a powerful and wise creature, known for its holy breath and its love of order and justice.

name: Amber Dragon
description: The Amber Dragon is a resilient and adaptive creature, known for its amber breath and its love of change.

name: Obsidian Dragon
description: The Obsidian Dragon is a fierce and unyielding creature, known for its obsidian breath and its love of conquest.

name: Sapphire Dragon
description: The Sapphire Dragon is a graceful and elegant creature, known for its sapphire breath and its love of beauty.

name: Bob the Dragon
description: Bob may not be the strongest dragon, but he's got a heart of gold and a fierce sense of loyalty.

name: Drakonius Maximus
description: Drakonius Maximus is a colossal dragon with a fierce temper and a taste for destruction.

name: Fluffy the Destroyer
description: Despite the cute name, Fluffy is a ferocious dragon with an insatiable hunger for treasure.

name: Sizzlepuff
description: Sizzlepuff is a tiny dragon with a fiery personality and a taste for adventure.

name: Sir Reginald Fizzlebottom
description: Sir Reginald is a noble dragon with impeccable manners and a refined taste in hoards.

name: Balthazar the Fierce
description: Balthazar is a dragon with a legendary reputation for ferocity and an insatiable thirst for battle.

name: Glimmerwing
description: Glimmerwing is a beautiful dragon with shimmering scales and a gentle nature.

name: Baron Von Firebreath
description: Baron Von Firebreath is a dragon with a taste for the finer things in life, and a penchant for setting things on fire.
